structure.unit: COUNTY AND CITY BRIDGES, TUNNELS, AND FERRIES

law.catch_line: Improvements to be contracted for before bonds are sold.

text.section: Before purchasing a bridge, the commission shall determine what repairs, additions or improvements will be necessary to place the bridge in safe and efficient condition for public use. The commission shall cause an estimate of the cost of the improvements to be made and submitted to it by an engineer appointed by the commission.
The commission shall contract for improvements before the sale of any bridge revenue bonds for the acquisition of the bridge.

law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 3235g-14.
